GeneralInformation.School Mission: To develop all pupils to their full potential and to imbue in them the sense of self-worth.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our motto, "The Best is in Me", encapsulates our desire to add value to every child and inspire him / her to do his / her best regardless of ability or background. We believe that every child is unique, with his or her own strengths and talents. We endeavour to create a safe and engaging environment where the learner is an active partner in the learning process, and nurture leaders who exhibit kindness, compassion and empathy. Our shared values (Self-worth, Integrity, Responsibility) guide us to respect the intrinsic Self-worth of individuals, uphold Integrity in all that we do and act Responsibly to ensure the well-being of staff and students.  To inspire our learners and bring out the best in them, we have Student-Centric, Values-Driven initiatives to ensure that we provide an engaging environment and enriched learning for our students.  We create a stimulating learning environment for our students to encourage learning through play, exploration and discovery. The beautiful school landscape, with different thematic gardens and eco-gardens serves as a Nature-based Community Classroom.  This aims to develop self-directed learning through the teaching of natural sciences and outdoor environmental education. The convenient use of ICT empowers our students to learn on-the-go with digital devices, anytime, anywhere, all within the school.   We celebrate diversity, unity and successes in LPS' journey towards excellence. We leverage on the rich opportunities offered to create exciting school experiences for our students.  We strive to provide students with holistic education. The strength of our programmes anchors on curricular customisation to level up low progress students and stretch the potential of our higher progress students. We have varied curricular and co-curricular programmes to cater to the diverse needs and aspirations of the students.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: GOVERNMENT SCHOOL / CO-ED SCHOOL / SINGLE SESSION

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: The school believes in providing opportunities for all students to be part of a holistic school experience that prepares them for the future. The key school-wide programmes, as featured below, are designed to meet our student profile, needs and interests while offering to our students a buffet of opportunities for holistic development:  Start-Right Programme (SRP) The school believes in cultivating a positive culture of learning by developing the desired mindset of starting the year right. Conducted at the start of every semester, our SRP consists of modules that focus on establishing desired expectations and behaviours, enhancing Socio-Emotional competencies, equipping students with strategies to learn and honing their leadership skills.  Applied Learning Programme: Nature-Based Education (NBE)  Through three key areas of focus - Nature Exploration, Nature as Learning Context, and Applied Learning in Nature Conservation, the NBE provides our students with opportunities to construct their own meaning of knowledge and acquire life skills through interaction with the environment around them.  Learning for Life Programme: Creative-Arts Education (CAE) The CAE facilitates the acquisition of the Art knowledge and technical skills, the development of life-ready competencies such as creativity, innovation, cross-cultural understanding and resilience, and the inculcation of our school values.  Every student is given opportunities for creative action, artistic pleasure and emotional response as well as to gain insights into cultural values and beliefs.  Loyang IT (LIT) Programme  The LIT programme aims to build our students' ICT competencies, deepen their learning through ICT and cultivate a socially responsible culture through cyber wellness. During the 1-hour weekly lesson, students are provided with learning tasks to apply the ICT knowledge and skills such as presentation tools, Web 2.0 and video editing to deepen their learning in respective subject areas.
